description.name: daierc20
description.tagline: Dai Token erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-dai Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Dai Token erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/dai receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/dai wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
